reviewText: Johnnie To is one of the great directors of action films in the world!  Exciting, funny, a real joy.

Interesting story about a gang of pickpockets that have elevated the crime to nearly an art form. Despite crime being the centerpiece of the film, the movie overall has a good balance of lightheartedness and intensity. Its not at all formulaic like Hollywood movies tend to be; and youll never be certain where its going next. I found the movie enjoyable; and having been in the Causeway Bay area of Hong Kong where this was filmed, the familiar scenery made it even more so.

For an excellent review without spoilers see: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0491044/reviews-3

I always am looking for films that are out of the ordinary. I was fully engaged in the story and found the main characters interesting. This is among the better Asian films that I have seen. I personally recommend it.
